name: Ribbit! Don't forget the tea!
description:
Even frogs go on holiday occasionally, but packing can be quite a challenge. Especially if have to cram in the tea set, you almost forgot to pack.

Click and drag the items in the bag to move them. Try to get the tea set in the green area to complete the level.

This game was made during the "Technically a Game Jam" game jam from 25/04/2022 - 02/05/2022 with the theme "Like X but Y" 
Our game: Like Rush Hour, but you have to put something in. (also frog)

Made by:

EthanF4D from www.fight4dream.com - Programming/sfx

Gabby Gaston - http://audiobygg.com/ - Music & Ambience

 Ilja Ham -  www.ilja_ham.artstation.com/ - Game Art

Paco Juan - https://github.com/pacojq - Assistance
